articles.title: Getting Started with LoyalBoards
articles.description: Comprehensive guide to login, navigation, and your first steps.

content.text: Welcome to LoyalBoards! We've designed our platform to be as intuitive as possible. This guide will walk you through the basics of accessing your account and navigating the dashboard.
Logging In Securely
We use a passwordless 'Magic Link' system to ensure the highest security for your account. Here is how it works:

items: Visit the login page and enter your email address.
Click 'Send Magic Link'.
Check your email inbox for a message from LoyalBoards.
Click the link inside the email to be instantly signed in.

content.alt: Login Screen Example showing email input

content.text: Note: If you don't see the email within a few minutes, please check your Spam or Junk folder.
Your Dashboard
Once logged in, you will land on your personal Dashboard. This is the central hub where you can manage all your feedback boards, view aggregate analytics, and access settings.

content.alt: Dashboard Overview with Analytics cards and Board List

articles.title: Your Profile & App Appearance
articles.description: Personalize your identity and the look of the application.

content.text: Editing Your Profile
To update your personal details, click on your avatar in the top right corner of the screen (or the hamburger menu on mobile) and select 'Settings'. in the Profile tab, you can:

items: **Display Name**: This is the name visible to you and potentially on posts you create.
**Profile Picture**: Upload a custom avatar. If you remove it, we will default to your initials.

content.alt: Profile Settings Modal showing name and image upload

content.text: Customizing App Appearance
Make LoyalBoards your own with our flexible theming engine. In the Settings menu, navigate to the 'Appearance' tab.

items: **Themes**: Choose from our curated list of light and dark themes.
**Randomizer**: Feeling adventurous? Use the Randomizer to generate a unique combination of fonts, colors, and border styles.
**Reset**: If you want to go back to the original look, simply click 'Reset to default' at the bottom of the panel.

articles.title: Creating & Customizing Boards
articles.description: Master the art of board creation, from basic setup to advanced design.

content.text: Creating a New Board
On your main dashboard, locate the 'Create Board' section. Simply enter a name for your new board (e.g., 'Feature Requests' or 'Bug Reports') and click Create. Your board will be live instantly.
Advanced Board Settings
To access advanced settings, click the 'Edit' button (pencil icon) on any board card. This opens a modal with several tabs:
1. General Settings

items: **Board Name & Description**: Update these at any time to reflect the board's purpose.
**Slug (URL)**: You can customize the link to your board (e.g., /boards/roadmap). Verified owners can change this once every 24 hours.
**Form Customization**: Change the title of the input form (e.g., 'Suggest a feature') and the submit button text (e.g., 'Send Idea').

content.alt: Board Edit Modal - General Settings tab

content.text: 2. Appearance

Give each board a unique identity. You can set specific colors and styles that differ from your main app theme. You can also use the 'Use profile settings' button to instantly sync the board's look with your personal theme.
3. Empty State
Define what users see when a board has no posts. You can set a custom Title and Description to encourage the first few submissions.

articles.title: Collecting Public Feedback
articles.description: How your users interact with your boards, voting, and commenting.

content.text: Your boards are public spaces where your community can shape your product. Here is what your users can do:
Viewing and Filtering
Users can browse all feedback posts. To find specific topics, they can use the **Search Bar** at the top. They can also **Sort** the list by 'Newest' or 'Top Voted' to see what's trending.

content.alt: Public Board View showing search and filter options

content.text: Interacting

items: **Posting**: Users can submit new ideas using the form at the top of the board.
**Upvoting**: A simple click on the chevron icon upvotes a post. This requires no login if Anonymous Voting is enabled.
**Commenting**: Users can click on any post to open the details view and leave comments.

articles.title: Billing & Subscription Management
articles.description: Understanding plans, payment methods, and access control.

content.text: We offer flexible plans to suit your needs, including Monthly subscriptions and One-time Lifetime deals.
Managing Your Subscription
Click the 'Billing' button in your dashboard header to open the Customer Portal. From here you can:

items: Upgrade or Downgrade your plan.
Update your credit card or payment method.
Download past invoices for accounting.

content.text: What happens if I cancel?

If you cancel your subscription, your account will remain active until the end of the billing period. After that, your access to creating new boards will be restricted, but you will still be able to log in and view your data.

articles.title: Troubleshooting & Support
articles.description: Solutions to common issues and how to contact us.

content.text: Common Issues

items: **Magic Link not arriving**: Check your Spam/Promotions folder. Ensure you entered the correct email address.
**Cannot change Board URL**: For security, we limit URL changes to once every 24 hours per board.
**Changes not saving**: Ensure you are connected to the internet. Our app syncs in real-time, but a dropped connection might prevent saves.

content.text: Contact Support
If you need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. You can contact us via the 'Support' link in the footer or email us directly at support@loyalboards.io.
